## Class `LSTMStateTuple`

Tuple used by LSTM Cells for `state_size`, `zero_state`, and output state.



### Aliases:

* Class <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/nn/rnn_cell/LSTMStateTuple"><code>tf.compat.v1.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMStateTuple</code></a>
* Class <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/nn/rnn_cell/LSTMStateTuple"><code>tf.contrib.rnn.LSTMStateTuple</code></a>


<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->

Stores two elements: `(c, h)`, in that order. Where `c` is the hidden state
and `h` is the output.

Only used when `state_is_tuple=True`.

<h2 id="__new__"><code>__new__</code></h2>

``` python
__new__(
    _cls,
    c,
    h
)
```

Create new instance of LSTMStateTuple(c, h)
